name: Last Police Officer
description:
The town is full of criminals, taking money from honest citizens who then turn to crime in times of need. Sadly there is only one officer left to keep law and order.

Control with Arrows. Capture criminals and bring them to the jail.

Space resets the game after you win or loose.

All visuals assets and the soundtrack were done by me in around 20 mins which explains the weird music and visuals :) Have fun.

Tools used: Unity, Asesprite, 1Bitdragon
